page.title: 20THE FORESTER TODAY 2
page.content: trees go for fencing,intermediate for paper pulp & large for building.Wood is still major material & is the third import to G.B.after food & oil.We also plant for amenity & conservation & mot orway verges.Harvesting takes many yrs Thinning out begins after 18-24yrs th en every 5 until final cropping-50-75 yrs for conifers,90-150 hardwoods. {Dangers?}We wear leg protectors, safety helmets,boots eye shields,anti- vibration gloves & ear defenders.Bran ches could snap or a chain saw may slip.Hearing & nerves can be damaged. {Hard work?}Tree felling is.Men usually retire from outside work at 45-50.We work in all weathers except when v.wet & cold.The normal day is 7\hrs but I'm on call 24 hrs for emergencies eg fire I can travel 180mls a day.D.BAYS,D.KNA PP,A.STEPHENSON,K.BRANCHFLOWER,P.DORAN E.Park School(Birch Hill) 2nd Year.
